sense.gloss: clever, bright, sharp, wise, intelligent, sagacious

sdata.j: そういう↑相手↑↓あいて↓の↑前↑↓まえ↓では、↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑見↑↓み↓せ↑掛↑↓か↓けだけの↑怜悧↑↓れいり↓な↑技術↑↓ぎじゅつ↓は、↑見抜↑↓みぬ↓かれた↑時↑↓とき↓に↑負↑↓ま↓けていたと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think that against somebody like that, my seemingly clever techniques would be seen through and then I would be defeated.
